paper.title: A Portfolio Diversification Strategy via Tail Dependence Clustering
paper.abstract: We provide a two-stage portfolio selection procedure in order to increase the diversification benefits in a bear market. By exploiting tail dependence-based risky measures, a cluster analysis is carried out for discerning between assets with the same performance in risky scenarios. Then, the portfolio composition is determined by fixing a number of assets and by selecting only one item from each cluster. Empirical calculations on the EURO STOXX 50 prove that investing on selected assets in trouble periods may improve the performance of risk-averse investors.

domain_result.justification: 该论文提出了一种两阶段的投资组合选择程序，旨在通过尾部依赖聚类分析来增加熊市中的多样化收益，并实证证明了该方法对风险厌恶投资者的益处。这直接涉及投资组合的构建和优化，属于投资组合管理领域。
